title: Congressional oversight of the federal bureaucracy

content.question: Congress is most likely to exert oversight of the executive bureaucracy in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Directly selecting the head of an executive agency
Impeaching the head of an executive agency
Using the Court to block implementation of proposed regulations
Controlling an executive agency’s annual budget
Changing the term length of heads of independent regulatory commissions

content.answer: Controlling an executive agency’s annual budget

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
